means: 单调乏味地，无生气地，无光彩地

sentence.Network_en: Year after year of his young manhood went by quietly and drably in Salem.
sentence.Network_cn: 年复一年,他在塞勒姆平静而单调的渡过青年时代.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Sheet1 - 豆丁网 ... domestication 归化法 drably 表达干巴 draft 草稿.
She dresses drably ., 她的穿着单调乏味.

auth_sentence.content: That first uneventful week, these promises were drably betrayed; Phillip didn't even show up for work.
auth_sentence.res_content: That first uneventful week, these promises were drably betrayed; Phillip didn't even show up for work.

auth_sentence.content: She is middle-aged and drably clothed, with a certainty of will that would not be out of place in a mother superior.
